Curve Fit Summary
========================================================

* Attempted Fits: `r nrow(fitData)`
* Successful Fits: `r nrow(fitData[approved==TRUE,])`
* Failed Fits: `r nrow(fitData[approved==FALSE,])`

```{r categories, results='asis', echo=FALSE}
categories <- fitData[ , length(curveid), by = category]
setnames(categories, c("Categories", " "))
table <- paste0(kable(categories, output = FALSE), collapse = "\n")
cat(table)
```
